name: We Were Here

reviews:
I personally didn't really enjoy this as a game. The puzzles are too easy to feel good about solving. Or time-consuming just for the sake of it (looking at you, gate maze >.> It wasn't so much a puzzle as just going from one end of the map to the next, and back again).

Also, devs don't really seems to care about it. It's been like 8 years, and there's a bunch of really obvious, easily reproducible bugs. But they make 4 more games before fixing this one :.)

Bruh, we couldn't even finish the game cuz of a nasty bug in Chess lol!
Idk, pretty mid
My wife said if this review gets 50 likes and 5 awards, she will buy a case of beer, guys help me out.

short_description: Lost in a frozen wasteland and split up from your partner inside an abandoned castle, the only possession you have left is a walkie-talkie with a familiar voice on the other end. Can the two of you find your way out in time?
